channel.title: Lowering experience
channel.description:
I know this is a tutorial because I have seen it before, but it's been a while since I have needed it. I have looked everywhere (almost) in my source for where I change the experience gained for doing whatever and I can not find it. I also tried using the search, but I am not sure what to search for. So, where is the link that will help me edit my skills?
Oh, and what's an illegal escape character? I got this error from compiling.
(Thanks)
No flaming, please, as I have tried to search for this already.
